main event: On October 14, 1951, two children spotted a glittering object while playing outside in Lowell, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The children called for their father to come outside, but by the time he arrived, the objects had disappeared., The report was submitted by civilians, specifically children., The incident drew interest due to the lack of conventional data available to form a conclusion., The children had read about flying saucers in a magazine, which influenced their belief in what they saw., No formal investigation was conducted into the sighting.
